settings.title:
Introducing Fièra
Beauty Basics
settings.sub_title: Fiera products have received over 4000 5-Star reviews so far. Join hundreds of thousands of happy customers today!
settings.content: For every concealer and neck cream sold, we donate up to 4 meals to people in need. So far, we have donated over 350.000 meals thanks to our amazing customers. We are proud to be able to make a difference!

settings.title: How Fièra <br class="forMob">Beauty Basics Works
settings.sub_title: Conceal any imperfections with our concealer, and perfect your look with our silky ultra-lux setting powder. Scientifically formulated to work together, this duo will ensure your makeup is set and guarantee you that fresh all day look long into the evening.
settings.content_1: Covers up even the most stubborn wrinkles, deep fine lines, puffy under-eye bags and unsightly blemishes
settings.content_2: Active ingredients like caprylic triglyceride and hydrolyzed collagen will soften skin and restore suppleness and moisture.
settings.content_3: Fièra Luxury Concealer restores moisture to promote healing of your skin
settings.content_4: Fièra HD matte ultra luxury finishing powder locks in your makeup for all day wear

settings.title: Our Fièra Promise
settings.content: Fièra is not your average beauty line. We offer the highest quality products with unstoppable results. Our products focus on delivering innovative science, quality, and convenience. Not just a beauty brand, Fièra is committed to supporting our community through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest by donating a portion of our sales to help feed those in need.

settings.title: Vitamin E
settings.content: A moisturizing antioxidant that reduces water loss through the skin.

settings.title: Hyaluronic Acid
settings.content: The world’s most water-loving molecule functions as a lubricant between the connective tissues to prevent dehydration & wrinkles.

settings.title: Vitamin C
settings.content: Protecting skin cells against oxidative damage from free radicals.

settings.title: Haloxyl
settings.content: Helps with reducing those dark under-eye circles.

settings.title: Active Ingredients
settings.sub_title: The Fièra luxury bundle has been scientifically formulated to be a comprehensive all in one solution for even the most stubborn expression lines, under-eye bags, and other facial blemishes giving your skin a flawless all day finish.
settings.popup_content:
Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Cetyl Alcohol, Ozokerite, Phytosteryl Macadamiate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lecithin, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopherol, Glycerin, Steareth-20, Chrysin, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, [+/- (May Contain): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Ultramarines (CI 77007)].

Fièra HD Matte Finishing Powder

Oil Control: Talc, Calcium Carbonate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Chlorite, Dolomite, Magnesite, [+/- (May Contain): Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Mica (CI 77019)].

settings.content: Put a small amount of concealer on your Fièra Concealer Brush and lightly sweep over blemished areas.
Dip the Fièra Setting Powder brush into your setting powder and tap 2 times to release extra powder. Lightly brush over entire face to set your makeup.
For oily or combination skin, use the setting powder throughout the day to help manage shine and refresh your natural beauty.

settings.title: 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.content: We’re so confident you'll love our Fièra products we offer a Hassle-free 30 day Money Back Guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your purchase simply return the items back to us for a full refund.
